About us


Hi and welcome to our price prediction application!

We are three students currently studying Object Oriented Programming with a focus on AI at NBI Handelsakademin in Malm√∂. In this project we explored a dataset consisting of information about the housing market in Melbourne between 2016-2018. We've worked with data pre-processing, clustering and rendering R2 scores for different types of models. For our Front End we chose to implement a Google Maps API where you can simply click anywhere on the map to fetch coordinates of your desired location and make a prediction of the price. We've had a little over three weeks to complete this project and it has been a fun and educating beginner's project to implement an AI-algorithm resulting in a working web application.

If you're interested in seeing more of our code, feel free to give our Github repository a look!

Thanks!
Fredrik, Pelle and Chi-Pei
